pkgmetadata.longdescription: AHP Hybrid Method // The AHP method (Analytic Hierarchy Process) is a multi-criteria decision-making method addressing choice and outranking problems. The method enables to perform the analysis of alternatives in each type of criterion and then provides a global performance of each alternative in the decision context. The main difference of this package is the possibility of evaluating the alternatives using quantitative data, by numerical representation, and qualitative data, using the Saaty scale, providing preference relation between variables by a pairwise evaluation.
